question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. person
B. street sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The street sign is mounted on a pole and appears to be at a similar or slightly greater distance than the person, who is standing close to it; without a depth map, it's ambiguous whether the sign is further away.
